QuestData.Title: Onyx Hearts
QuestData.Description: The Shan'ze Serpentbinders dominate the minds of wild cloud serpents, but they also create their own dark creatures from stone, metal, blood, and ancient sorcery.$B$BTheir creations, the Onyx Stormclaws, guard the island to the northwest.$B$BI wish to study the magic binding these creatures. Bring me their hearts, so that I can better understand what sorcery we are up against.
